amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize the use of funds to enhance security measures in and around a school, religious institution, medical or health facility (including a research facility), housing complex, shelter, or other facility or surroundings where a threat to law and order exists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow for the use of funds from the bill to enhance security measures at medical or health facilities, including research facilities, where a threat to law and order exists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoke amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 225 (Roll no. 126).
